comments:
The classpath of your plug-in must NEVER be tweaked manually.
If you want a certain plug-in's JARs to appear on your classpath, open the 
plugin.xml file of your plug-in, go to the dependencies page, and add that 
plug-in to the list of dependencies.  Upon saving the file, PDE will add those 
JARs to your classpath, and when you test it, the runtime will be able to load 
those classes.
